ygData.subject: Re: Help!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I actually let my account lapse once, by accident of course, and my key still worked a month later when I fixed the problem and started back up. Granted, this
ygData.messageBody:
I actually let my account lapse once, by accident
of course, and my key still worked a month later
when I fixed the problem and started back up. Granted,
this might not apply to an account that's been
deactivated for 6 months or more, but I can't understand why
Verant would require you to buy their product twice just
because you quit for a while. (Well, yes, I understand
why the money-grubbing bastards would but that's
besides the point.)<br><br>Maybe if you send an email to
Tech Support or CS they might be able to fix the
problem? Could just be that trying to create a new account
is keeping you from using the code. If that's the
case, Verant might not be too understanding. But if
you're using the same account as before, with the same
station name and all, there shouldn't be a
problem.<br><br>Let us know what happens, and if you fix this, so we
know how to address this problem if anyone else runs
across it in the future.<br><br>Tyral
Stormfang<br>Ranger<br>Commander of the Knights of Prophecy<br>General of
Kelethin<br>Lanys T'Vyl
